subject: Nutrition
title: B1 Thiamine and Beriberi
description: One-minute skill: B1 Thiamine and Beriberi.

hook.text: In the 1800s, a mysterious disease paralyzed and killed millions across Asia. The cause was white rice.

buildup.text: Beriberi attacks the nervous system and heart. It spread as polished white rice replaced brown rice.

discovery.text: Dutch doctor Christiaan Eijkman noticed chickens fed white rice got sick but recovered on brown rice.

twist.text: The cure was in the husk all along. Polishing rice removed the B1 that prevented the disease.

climax.text: Today, beriberi still appears in populations dependent on refined grains and in chronic alcoholism.

punchline.text: A grain's outer layer held the cure for millions.
